job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.

   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

Your team

   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions., "The most of what I get out of my work is the unique freedom given to grow and to develop. I truly am an entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together."
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer

We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.

   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

Your team

   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions., "The most of what I get out of my work is the unique freedom given to grow and to develop. I truly am an entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together."

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on developing user-facing applications leveraging generative AI and conversational agents, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The emphasis on translating new technologies into user-friendly products, rapid prototyping, and iterative improvement, alongside backend and API development, strongly supports this classification.

phrases: translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product
building a new product from scratch
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the core responsibility of building and integrating AI features into applications, including API development and creating user-friendly interfaces.

phrases: leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents
job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly mentions working with generative AI and conversational agents, which falls under the modeling aspect of GenAI.

phrases: support healthcare providers in their logistical processes
support healthcare workers with logistical challenges
job_tasks.justification: The role is focused on applying AI to solve specific business problems within the healthcare logistics domain.

phrases: willingness to learn and implement new technologies
iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies
job_tasks.justification: The description highlights the need to adapt to and learn new technologies in a rapidly evolving field.

phrases: entrepreneur in our own market group
Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together
building a new product from scratch
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'entrepreneur', 'initiatives are appreciated', and 'building from scratch' suggest a need for ownership and proactive contribution.

phrases: less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery
job_tasks.justification: The job requires analytical skills to solve problems and a pragmatic approach to deliver solutions quickly and iterate based on feedback.
